/* MainMapper.selectSampleList */
SELECT * FROM OH051 WHERE rownum < 11
/* MainMapper.selectCodeList */ SELECT ext1_cd AS id ,cd_nm AS name ,ext2_cd AS xx ,ext3_cd AS yy FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd='98002' ORDER BY id

/* MainMapper.selectCtgList */ WITH "DATA" AS ( ( SELECT ctg_lg_nm, totCnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN h_addr = (SELECT cd FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd = '98002' AND cd = h_addr) THEN h_addr ELSE '기타' END AS h_addr FROM ch001 t1 LEFT JOIN CH010 t2 ON t1.tckt_id = t2.tckt_id WHERE t1.crt_dt = sysdate AND t1.ctg_lg_cd = a.ctg_lg_cd ) WHERE h_addr = ( SELECT cd FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd = '98002' AND ext1_cd = #{sigungu} ) ) AS addrCnt FROM ( SELECT ctg_lg_cd, ( SELECT ctg_cd_nm FROM om020 WHERE ctg_cd = ctg_lg_cd ) AS ctg_lg_nm, COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM CH001 t1 LEFT JOIN CH010 t2 ON t1.tckt_id = t2.tckt_id WHERE t1.crt_dt = sysdate GROUP BY ctg_lg_cd ORDER BY totCnt DESC ) a ORDER BY addrCnt DESC ) UNION ALL SELECT '합계', COUNT(*) AS totCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN ( h_addr = ( SELECT cd FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd = '98002' AND ext1_cd = #{sigungu} ) ) THEN 1 END) AS addr FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN h_addr = (SELECT cd FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd = '98002' AND cd = h_addr) THEN h_addr ELSE '기타' END AS h_addr FROM CH001 t1 LEFT JOIN CH010 t2 ON t1.tckt_id = t2.tckt_id WHERE t1.crt_dt = sysdate ) )
SELECT ctg_lg_nm, addrCnt, TO_CHAR( (addrCnt / CAST((SELECT addrCnt FROM "DATA" WHERE ctg_lg_nm ='합계') AS DOUBLE) *100), '999.99') AS addrPcnt, totCnt, TO_CHAR( (totCnt / CAST((SELECT totCnt FROM "DATA" WHERE ctg_lg_nm ='합계') AS DOUBLE) *100), '999.99') AS totPcnt FROM "DATA" WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

/* MainMapper.selectMainChartList */
SELECT h_addr, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN h_addr = (SELECT cd FROM sm002 WHERE tp_cd = '98002' AND cd = h_addr) THEN h_addr ELSE '기타' END AS h_addr, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ch010 WHERE crt_dt = sysdate GROUP BY h_addr ) GROUP BY h_addr UNION ALL SELECT '합계', COUNT(*) FROM ch010 WHERE 1 = 1 and crt_dt = sysdate
